EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-01 Future of APM and Cloud Optimization.ES-5/1 APM Webinar Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: What To Expect: The Future of APM and Cloud Optimization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-appdynamics-vs-dynatrace/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-appdynamics-vs-dynatrace/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Did you know that container adoption by enterprises is expected to grow by 165% in the next 18 months <[[https://turbonomic.com/state-of-multicloud/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTXpNeVl6TXlZbVpoT1dNMCIsInQiOiJqNE82QXZnK09NaWUxWHhoR25hNVg5QVFZVng0cnJEWVpEQkNvY05OV2dQVTJma282NDdSN1VhekQydjAxS1p2ODF6TndTWFQyK1wvd2xCVGlSY20zT0E9PSJ9]]>? This trend necessitates that you optimize the performance of your code, application dependencies, and user experiences. Are you familiar with how Application Performance Management (APM) can help you keep up?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-appdynamics-vs-dynatrace/]]>
Join our webinar on Wednesday at 11 am ET to learn:
- How customers are getting the most value from APM integrations with AIOps technologies - What to expect for the future of application performance assurance - and more!
I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-appdynamics-vs-dynatrace/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-appdynamics-vs-dynatrace/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
